item.title: FIRST HORIZON CORP 10-K
item.description: FIRST HORIZON CORP, which is in the National Commercial Banks [6021] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 01, 2023 had 79110 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 880 instances fhn - 741 instances loans - 674 instances 1 - 628 instances financial - 576 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
